name: Time Galleon Boniface
description:
A game for Trijam 121 Exploring spacetime.

Adventuring to the end of time and space the brave crew of the time Galleon Boniface find themselves in the jurisdiction of the Hyper-goats. Notoriously secretive and hostile to outsiders the Hyper-goats capture Boniface.

Imprisoned by the singularity at the centre of the slowly collapsing universe.  Their only hope of escape is to collect enough of the mysterious Cosmic Gems the goats hoard to power the Dimensional Furnace.

Encased in stasis cubes Boniface will need to reach peak ramming speed to release the Gems.

Avoid the Hyper-goats and beware of the singularity's powerful gravity field.

Will the goats reveal their dark secret?
